ground_truth_bugs.description: findMembers returns undefined when name is empty, breaking callers that expect a promise
create action ignores alias_level parameter while update handles it, causing data inconsistency
Test uses PUT for remove_member but route expects DELETE, test will fail with routing error
Template iterates over 'members' but controller doesn't have 'members' property, should use 'model.members'
Pagination next action caps offset at user_count, causing empty last page when offset == user_count

droid_false_positives.droid_comment: Template path issue - templateName 'admin/templates/group_member' is allegedly wrong
droid_false_positives.reasoning: All existing admin views use the same 'admin/templates/...' pattern for templateName, and the template file exists at admin/templates/group_member.hbs. This follows the exact same convention as all other admin views.
